---
title: "Sony"
description: "PTP Sony definitions"
---

# Sony

## SDIO_OpenSession

**Code:** `0x9210`

Open Session with Function Mode.

**Data Direction:** none

**Value:** 0x00000000

### Operation Parameters

- **SessionId** (required): Unique session identifier

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_Connect

**Code:** `0x9201`

This is for the Sony SDIO authentication handshake.

**Data Direction:** out

**Value:** 0x01

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_GetExtDeviceInfo

**Code:** `0x9202`

Get the protocol version and the supported properties of the connected device.

**Data Direction:** out

**Value:** 0x012c

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_GetExtDevicePropValue

**Code:** `0x9251`

Get the DevicePropInfo.

**Data Direction:** out

### Operation Parameters

- **DevicePropCode** (required): Property code to get

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_SetExtDevicePropValue

**Code:** `0x9205`

Set a DevicePropValue for a device property.

**Data Direction:** in

**Value:** 0x00000000

### Operation Parameters

- **DevicePropCode** (required): Property code to set

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_ControlDevice

**Code:** `0x9207`

Set the SDIControl value for the SDIControlCode.

**Data Direction:** in

**Value:** 0x00000000

### Operation Parameters

- **sdiControlCode** (required): Control property code

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_GetAllExtDevicePropInfo

**Code:** `0x9209`

Obtain all support DevicePropDescs at one time. The host will send this operation at regular intervals to obtain the latest (current) camera settings.

**Data Direction:** out

**Value:** 0x00000000

### Operation Parameters

- **flagOfGetOnlyDifferenceData** (required): Flag of get only difference data

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_GetOsdImage

**Code:** `0x9238`

Get OSD image

**Data Direction:** out

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None

---

## SDIO_GetPartialLargeObject

**Code:** `0x9211`

Get partial object from the device. Same as GetPartialObject on PIMA 15740 but with 64-bit offset support.

**Data Direction:** out

### Operation Parameters

- **ObjectHandle** (required): Object handle
- **OffsetLower** (required): Offset in bytes (lower 32 bits)
- **OffsetUpper** (required): Offset in bytes (upper 32 bits)
- **MaxBytes** (required): Maximum number of bytes to obtain (does not support 0xFFFFFFFF)

### Response Parameters

- **ActualBytesSent** (required): Actual number of bytes sent

---

## SDIO_SetContentsTransferMode

**Code:** `0x9212`

Enable content transfer mode to access memory card content.

**Data Direction:** none

**Value:** 0x00000000

### Operation Parameters

None

### Response Parameters

None

---
